fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: ~ Supply (2-shot): Target a player during the night. If they have a limited-use ability, you will give them one more shot of it. This cannot be used to refill ammo of any Jack of All Trades-like ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
~ If you are present in the game, all other Agent roles gain 1 more ammo for an ability of their choice.
~ If you are nightkilled, the killer(s) will receive 1 more ammo to an ability of their choice.
